title: Red River Co-op
text: Red River Cooperative Limited, branded as Red River Co-op, is a retail <a href="cooperative">cooperative</a> operating in <a href="Winnipeg">Winnipeg</a>, <a href="Manitoba">Manitoba</a>, <a href="Canada">Canada</a>. Red River Co-op runs petroleum sales services in Winnipeg and with the acquisition of four <a href="Safeway%20%28Canada%29">Safeway</a> stores in 2014 began running grocery services as well. Its operations reach as far east as <a href="Dryden%2C%20Ontario">Dryden, Ontario</a>.
